scripts.build: cd client && yarn build && cd .. && rm -rf server/client && mkdir server/client && cp -r client/dist/* server/client && cd server && yarn build
scripts.docker:cold: docker container kill $(docker ps -q) && docker-compose up --force-recreate
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose build client && docker-compose build server
scripts.cleanup: (cd client && rm -rf dist) && (cd server && rm -rf dist)
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules && (cd client && yarn nuke) && (cd server && yarn nuke) && (cd shared && yarn nuke)
